name: Zhulik.exe
description: Feel like a trader and buy magical product cheaper to sell it with extra charge. Grow your capital in the fascinating and colorful adventures of the Rogue. Earn money by using the simple "Buy&Sell" scheme. Put money to the bank and earn more!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Atom Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Storage: 50 MB available space
